description: This file defines the DashboardProvider class responsible for managing the state of dashboard data in a Flutter application. It fetches vehicle, group, and event data from a DataSource, processes and stores metrics such as vehicle counts, groups, pending events, mileage, and upcoming events. It also notifies listeners about state changes.

classes.name: DashboardProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier-based provider class for managing dashboard state, including vehicle statistics, group counts, event statuses, and upcoming events. It uses a DataSource to load data asynchronously and updates listeners on changes.

methods.name: loadDashboardData
methods.description: Fetches vehicles, groups, and events from the data source, then computes various metrics and updates internal state accordingly. It handles errors gracefully and ensures listeners are notified after updates.
